name: AfterLife (itch) (TheSelks, Zvr8888, lucy213, dfuren2009, Zenit1337, Emma21011)
name_original: AfterLife (itch) (TheSelks, Zvr8888, lucy213, dfuren2009, Zenit1337, Emma21011)
description:
The journey to the Afterlife is a challenging experience, Can you help the great Pharoah, Ra-Thos navigate the pyramids chambers in order to reach eternity? But beware, you are not alone...

This game was made for the Gamedev.tv's 2022 Game Jam.

Artists who contributed to this game were-

Emma McMillan , Zoe von Runkel, Lucy Dickson and Kyle Forbes

Further credits are listed in game.
